page.title: 06ARTS AND CRAFTS - HEDINGHAM
page.content: Hidden within ordinary houses in Castle Hedingham are a number of crafts which could easily go unnoticed. A flower arranger in Nunnery Street, and Petalcraft in Sible Hedingham - this shop works in real and artificial flowers. A pottery in the village produces all types of fired pottery. Beekeeping is carried on with approx. 20 hives on two sites. Two crops per year are produced. The oil seed rape crop in Spring has to be removed when the flowers go off because the honey quickly crystalises. The main summer flower crop is removed in August.
